errors.name: EmptySupply
errors.msg: 流动性池中的代币供应为空

errors.name: RequiredParameter
errors.msg: 初始化时所有参数都是必需的

errors.name: LiquidityLocked
errors.msg: 流动性锁定，无法插入订单

errors.name: InsufficientLiquidationValue
errors.msg: 强制平仓后获得的SOL不足以偿还借款

errors.name: ExceedsMaxSolAmount
errors.msg: 用户设置的最大SOL可使用金额不足

errors.name: InsufficientRepayment
errors.msg: 平仓收益不足以偿还借款

errors.name: InsufficientBorrowingReserve
errors.msg: 借款请求超过可用储备

errors.name: InsufficientTokenSale
errors.msg: 实际卖出的代币数量不足

errors.name: InsufficientLiquidity
errors.msg: 当前订单可提供的流动性不足

errors.name: TokenAmountDifferenceOutOfRange
errors.msg: 保证金交易时,区间计算误差值太大

errors.name: ArithmeticOverflow
errors.msg: 计算过程中发生数学溢出

errors.name: BorrowAmountMismatch
errors.msg: 借款金额与锁定代币数量不匹配

errors.name: UpHeadNotEmpty
errors.msg: 上涨链表头不为空，而客户端传入空值,无法进行普通买入交易

errors.name: DownHeadNotEmpty
errors.msg: 下跌链表头不为空，而客户端传入空值,无法进行普通卖出交易

errors.name: SellAmountExceedsOrderAmount
errors.msg: 卖出数量超过订单持有的代币数量

errors.name: OrderNotExpiredMustCloseByOwner
errors.msg: 未超时订单必须由开仓者平仓

errors.name: SettlementAddressMustBeOwnerAddress
errors.msg: 结算地址必须是开仓地址

errors.name: BuyAmountExceedsOrderAmount
errors.msg: 买入数量超过订单持有的代币数量

errors.name: InsufficientTradeAmount
errors.msg: 交易数量低于最小限制

errors.name: RemainingTokenAmountTooSmall
errors.msg: 剩余代币数量低于最小交易限制

errors.name: InvalidFeeRecipientAccount
errors.msg: 手续费接收账户地址不匹配

errors.name: InvalidOrderMintAddress
errors.msg: 订单mint地址与curve账户mint不匹配

errors.name: InsufficientStopLossLiquidity
errors.msg: 止损单预留流动性不足

errors.name: InvalidFeePercentage
errors.msg: 手续费分配比例必须在0-100之间

errors.name: InvalidLpPairsCount
errors.msg: LP配对数组长度必须等于MAX_ORDERS_COUNT

errors.name: InvalidStopLossPrice
errors.msg: 止损价格不满足最小间隔要求
